articles.title: Amanda Seyfried Finally Stakes Her Claim - The New York Times
articles.description: The “Mean Girls” and “Mamma Mia!” actress knows her performance as Marion Davies in“Mank” will be a turning point in her career. But first, she had to put some distance between herself and Hollywood.
